CustomField.formula:
(If( ISPICKVAL( FS_Davaco_Requirements__c, "No Site Assessment Required") ,"Complete", (If( ISPICKVAL( FS_Davaco_Requirements__c , "Davaco: New Construction Site Assessment") ,"Complete",
(If( AND(TEXT( FS_SA_Scheduled_On_Date__c )="" , TEXT( FS_SA_Completed_Date__c )=""),"**Pending",
(If( AND(TEXT(FS_SA_Scheduled_On_Date__c)<>"" , TEXT(FS_SA_Completed_Date__c)=""),"*Scheduled",
(If( AND(TEXT(FS_SA_Scheduled_On_Date__c)<>"" , TEXT(FS_SA_Completed_Date__c)<>""),"Complete","**Pending"))))))))))
CustomField.label: SA Status
